bibl.title: "Medius fidius ... Tantam pecuniam Nicomedenses perdiderint!" Roman Water Supply, Public Administration, and Private Contractors.

series.title: Université de Neuchâtel. Recueil des travaux publiés par la Faculté des Lettres et Sciences humaines.

bibl.note: See in part. pp. 311-313: 6. The water supply of cities in Roman Egypt. Relies mainly on P. Lond.
